name: dispatcher-protocol
description: Protocol used by the Simulations dispatching manager

scripts.test:coverage: npm run lint && nyc mocha test/ --recursive -c
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch -m "release: v%s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor -m "release: v%s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major -m "release: v%s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
